info.title: nextgen_order_api
info.description:
## Overview
Next Generation Order System (NGOS) is the agency view of the orders that stores order data required for business operations such as providing customer support, financial and accounting needs, etc. It is the prime service responsible for processing and managing orders. This system will be the source of truth for all orders and eventually it will replace the classic order system i.e. CBTS Order.  
Purchase API on the Next Generation platform will serve the customer's view of orders by retrieving data from NGOS data store.

The primary goals for building NGOS are to achieve:
1. A cloud based highly scalable solution that can replace the legacy on-premise order system
2. Product agnostic nature of the order management system
3. Configurable workflow for order creation and cancellation
4. Providing flexibility to the product and client teams for building customizations and deploying those independently of NGOS.

get.summary: Get purchase details by order id
